TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_u_wacu_ni_bayi, title = u_wacu_ni_bayi, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_wacu_ni_bayi} }

S.FORM: ci ling coco ku nganga niya wacu ni bayi,u lumeni'ay ku kulit niya wacu,u sanglacay a buyi ku kuku' ,sanasananal muhalhal i panan ni bayi takuwan manamuh ci coco muladay tayda i cacudadan nu nyadu' micuda atu ci kakana,ayaan adihan ci coco ma'kek mabulit i tapiingan,maydih puhpuhen ku tangah ni coco ayaan u duma'ku kades ni coco milibabuy kancay idaw ku caayay katingenan tayni i ci bayian,mamin libabuyan ni coco,i tini niyadu' u satabakiyay a hayu ci coco,inayi' ku cayay katining ci cocoan a wacu.
